column5: This beautiful condo is located in an exclusive upscale, quiet, green neighborhood. It can fit up to 6 people including families with kids. It is fully furnished, including all kitchen dishes, TV with cables, Wi-Fi and washer & dryer. It also has an amazing furnished private patio to sit and relax and of course a beautiful pool. It is close to all the necessary amenities in walking distance, including restaurant, bars, shopping, gas, groceries, synagogue & church.
column8: Cozy Condo in an Upscale Green area w\Patio & Pool
